description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A retro arcade shooter.. with a twist!  Pirate and Ninja must combine forces to save Pixel World!  Modeled after the games of yesteryear, this is the first entry in the Holmade Games 8-Bit Series.
description.short: A retro arcade shooter.. with a twist!  Pirate and Ninja must combine forces to save Pixel World!  Modeled after the games of yesteryear, this is the first entry in the Holmade Games 8-Bit Series.
